duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan and manage test execution, resource allocation, and weekly test report creation.

Lead software evaluation of head unit software focused on functions for upcoming new HU in various domains such as HMI, Navigation, Bluetooth, VR/Voice Assistant, DCM Apps, OTA, user profile, and legacy functions.
Communicate with mobile device manufacturers on potential device issues.
Report and track head unit software focused on all functions for upcoming new HU and legacy functions.
Create, execute function and regression test plan based on feature requirement.
Communicate and manage Tier 1 suppliers on head unit software fixes.
Participate in Agile ceremonies including daily standup, sprint planning, sprint refinement, and sprint demo.
Flexibility with off-hour work as required.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
